ml.dmlc.xgboost4j

Class LabeledPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.dmlc.xgboost4j.LabeledPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class LabeledPoint
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Labeled data point for training examples. Represent a sparse training instance.
    See Also:
